task.name: CleanUpCar
task.notes:
== Description == At a glance the car must look normally.
== Rationale == The car is over and over bloody.

task.name: CleanUpSeats
task.notes:
== Description == The seats must be cleaned.
== Rationale == It is not possible to completely clean the seats - therefore they will additionally be covered.

task.name: CleanUpVicentAndJules
task.notes:
== Description == Vincent and Jules must be cleaned.
== Rationale == Both are splattered with blood.

task.name: CorpseInTrunk
task.notes:
== Description == The corpse must be put into the trunk.
== Rationale == The corpse can be transported in this way without any notice of anybody else.

task.name: CoverWithBlankets
task.notes: == Description == The seats must be covered with blankets after they are roughly cleaned.

task.name: CreateOrder
task.notes:
== Description == The accidental death of a man must be disguised.
== Rationale == There are some different things which must be cleaned and others which must vanish.
== Note == There is only 40 minutes time to do the whole job.

task.name: DeadManDisapper
task.notes:
== Description == The dead man must disappear.
== Rationale == The accidental killed man must vanish.

task.name: DetergentForCar
task.notes:
== Description == The car must be cleaned with detergents.
== Rationale == The car is over and over bloody - so detergents are needed.
== Note == The detergents are place in the kitchen under the sink.

task.name: RoughlyCleanUpSeats
task.notes:
== Description == The seats must be roughly cleaned.
== Rationale == It is not possible to completely clean the back seat.

task.name: SoapAndColdWater
task.notes:
== Description == Vincent and Jules must clean themselves with soap and cold water.
== Rationale == They are bloody.

task.name: TakeCareOfClothing
task.notes:
== Description == Vincent and Jules' clothing must be taken care off.
== Rationale == It's bloody - Otto the refuse collector should not see this.

task.name: TakeOff
task.notes:
== Description == Vincent and Jules must take off their whole clothing.
== Rationale == It's bloody.
== Note == Wulf: 'Down to the bare ass'.
